Package dev.federicocapece.jdaze

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
dev.federicocapece.jdaze.Vector
public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
The Vector class, it is used to represent both positions and physical vectors. It includes some basic vectors math.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    float x
    The x coordinate of the Vector

    The y coordinate of the Vector

    • set

      public void set​(float x, float y)
      Set this Vector coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the new value of the x coordinate
      y - the new value of the y coordinate

    • set

      public void set​(Vector vectorToCopy)
      Set this Vector coordinates using another Vector. 
       Doing:
 vector1.set(vector2);
 It's almost the same as doing:
 vector1 = new Vector(vector2);
      Parameters:
      vectorToCopy - the vector that should be copied

    • setX

      public void setX​(float x)
      Set the x coordinate of this Vector
      Parameters:
      x - the new x coordinate value

      Parameters:

      public Vector normalize()
